Recommendations: a distinct research office furnish with amenity necessary in the conduct of research may be establish
an inhouse review of ongoing and complete research be conduct at the college level before the university level to monitor as well as evaluate the research
each faculty researcher may prepare an action plan at the start of the school year to monitor the progress of the conduct research
a department research journal may be publish
encourage all the faculty member in the department to get involve in research work
a seminar on ipr law may be conduct to be attend by faculty and student
strengthen linkage with local regional and national agency which be potential source of funding
